title: Qualcomm Wi-Fi SON LDB Service Improper Input Validation Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows network-adjacent attackers to execute arbitrary code on affected installations of multiple Qualcomm chipsets. Authentication is not required to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the Qualcomm LDB service. The issue results from the lack of proper validation of user-supplied data prior to further processing. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to execute code in the context of root.
addtionnal_details: Qualcomm Technologies has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://docs.qualcomm.com/product/publicresources/securitybulletin/april-2024-bulletin.html
